text: Puffin Browser is a remote browser made by Cloudmosa, an American technology company founded by Shopyn Shen. The browser was first released in the year 2010 and used encrypted servers to load web pages. According to some tests because of browser running on remote servers, the browser may be faster then a normal browser such as chrome and firefox. The browser also hides ip address from websites like a vpn or proxy and has flash support for mobile device.Puffin Web Browser Brings Flash to Mobile Phones , Lifehacker The browser also includes a game controller, a mouse, and a on screen keyboard. == References == Category:Web browsers
title: Puffin Browser
